fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Budget, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, External Relations, Food Safety, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: Our primary areas of interest relate to 1) Research and Innovation Activities 2) Environment, Energy and Industrial policy.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: We have been actively engaged in EU Framework Research activity for over twenty years. This has covered most areas but are currently focused on ensuring effective communication of project results to ensure that the results result in real and meaningful market impact
goals__remit: Innovation in the field of sustainable technologies. We seek to take ideas into a commercially viable state with partners from both industry, commerce and research. We seek to do this on a basis of long term benefits to participants and with an environmentally responsible perspective
